rows.label: qev065302_MSG0001
rows.name:
You set my heart adrift, like petals on a spring breeze.
O, love! That I might live out my days enveloped in
such a storm, as the eye of your florid hurricane.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Hmm? You've been staring for a while now.
Did you have a question?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Maxim if he's completely mental.

rows.label: qev065302_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Maxim that Lyvia wants to meet him.

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0003
rows.name:
Sentimental, surely. But I am also temperamental,
and as unpredictable as the capricious sea.
Yet at my core, I am but a humble poet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0004
rows.name:
A lone bard who is able to stoke the fire in his breast
and give wonder and delight to all who give it ear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0005
rows.name:
Though in truth, I would sooner whisper a sonnet to
a single girl who wished to share my life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0006
rows.name:
...She wants to meet me? Ah! Clearly this is a woman
of impeccable taste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0007
rows.name:
Then so be it. I have a strict policy of never turning
down a lady on anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0008
rows.name:
Still your fluttering heart in its breast, my unknown love!
Your bard is on his way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0009
rows.name:
She is a delight! To have one such as her seek me out
is the very definition of joy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065302_MSG0010
rows.name:
She is both delightful to the eyes and charming to the
heart. If I'm not careful, I may find myself falling for
her...[ST:wait ]
